results.title: Simvastatin effects on androgens, inflammatory mediators, and endogenous pituitary gonadotropins among patients with PCOS undergoing IVF: results from a prospective, randomized, placebo-controlled clinical trial.
results.text_hl: METHODS: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ were randomized to receive either oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, 20 mg/d (n = 32), or placebo (n = 32) in a prospective, double-blind, randomized clinical trial (NCT 005-75601) in parallel with controlled @<m>DISEASE_Ovarian_Hyperstimulation_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016471 @@@ovarian hyperstimulation@@@ for IVF.

citations.NLM: Rashidi B, Abediasl J, Tehraninejad E, Rahmanpour H, Sills ES. Simvastatin effects on androgens, inflammatory mediators, and endogenous pituitary gonadotropins among patients with PCOS undergoing IVF: results from a prospective, randomized, placebo-controlled clinical trial. J Investig Med. 2011 Aug;59(6):912-6. PMID: 21527854
